name: heroku
description: The official Heroku extension for VSCode

commands.title: Wait for dynos to run latest version
Compare app releases with downstream apps
Promote latest release to downstream apps
Pull Heroku db to local/remote db
Show dead rows and vacuum status
Run detached dyno with logs output
Track function call counts and time
List trusted IP ranges for space
Info for webhook event on app
Info for webhook event on app
Show actual run times on execution plan
Include buffer usage stats in logs
Set minimum execution time for logging
Include trigger execution stats in logs

scripts.compile: tsc -p ./src/extension/tsconfig.json & tsc -p ./src/webviews/tsconfig.json && node scripts/import-map-builder.mjs && node scripts/css-html-copy-watcher.mjs --copy-only
scripts.watch: npm run watch:extension & npm run watch:webviews
scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
